definitions.definition: to make a journey, usually over a long distance:
examples: Between school and university, she spent a year travelling, mostly in Africa and Asia.

definitions.definition: to move or go from one place to another:
examples: Supersonic planes can travel faster than the speed of sound.

definitions.definition: If something such as food travels well/badly, it does/does not stay in good condition if it is moved long distances:
to make a journey without taking a lot of heavy things with you:
examples: I always try to travel light.
a record of her travels in/around the Far East
